planets.name: Mercury
planets.god: Mercury (Roman) - god of merchants, travelers, and messages
planets.funFact: Mercury has no moons and it's the smallest planet in the solar system

planets.name: Venus
planets.god: Venus (Roman) - goddess of love and beauty
planets.funFact: Venus rotates in the opposite direction to most planets, including Earth

planets.name: Earth
planets.funFact: Earth is the only planet not named after a god

planets.name: Mars
planets.funFact: Mars is home to the tallest mountain in the solar system, Olympus Mons

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.funFact: Jupiter has the most moons of any planet in the solar system

planets.name: Saturn
planets.god: Saturn (Roman) - god of wealth and agriculture
planets.funFact: Saturn has the most extensive rings of any planet in the solar system

planets.name: Uranus
planets.funFact: Uranus rotates on its side, making its seasons very extreme

planets.name: Neptune
planets.funFact: Neptune has the strongest winds in the solar system
